channel.title: Anyone know if we can buy a VPS or Dedi by phone?
channel.description:
Anyone know if we can buy a VPS or Dedi by phone ? If so, tell me site please because I can't pay by card or other. I would pay by phone like RuneScape membership.
Thanks.

item.title: Anyone know if we can buy a VPS or Dedi by phone?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“docarter, post:6, topic:300482”]They sell pre-paid credit cards.
http://netspend.com[/quote]

I don’t understand this. How you buy it ? How does it works ?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know if we can buy a VPS or Dedi by phone?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:4, topic:300482”][quote author=twins link=topic=396751.msg2946726#msg2946726 date=1252257429]
just use paypal and no you cant pay through phone credits cause they can just swap how much money they want from t.
[/quote]

You can for runescape, so there might be a way. Not sure though, because they are 2 different things.[/quote]

I really need to buy a VPS, but I can’t by credit card or others. So, I can only by phone. Please, someone tell me a site where I can buy VPS by phone lol.

Read full topic
